text: Down the Ancient Staircase () is a 1975 Italian French drama movie directed by Mauro Bolognini and stars Marcello Mastroianni, Barbara Bouchet, Marthe Keller, Pierre Blaise, Fran√ßoise Fabian, Silvano Tranquilli.
